March 28, 1910 D Southern Counties Association Contest (1st Section)
Southern Counties Association Contest (1st Section) 8 Test Piece Contest Southern Counties Association Contest southern-counties-association-contest-1st-section
None
Verdi's Works [arr. W. Rimmer]
Priory Park, Chichester Prizes - 1st £6.14s. and cup, 2nd £4.13s., 3rd £3.2s. March contest - 1st Chichester, 2nd Reigate, 3rd West Crawley. Best cornet and trombone - Chichester. Best horn and euphonium - West Crawley. 3 bands competed
March 11, 2018, 5:14 p.m. March 11, 2018, 10:04 p.m.
1 Chichester City Band Arthur Muddiman
2 West Crawley A. Williams
3 Reigate Town J. E. Unwin
